chat_room - package chat_room
 
chat_room.client - package chat_room.client
 
chat_room.server - package chat_room.server
 
ChatParticipant - Class in chat_room
An object which plays a role of signal: when reading an instance of this class, this indicates that a new client has joined or an existing client has left.

Create a new chat-participant
Client - Class in chat_room.client
The client's end in a connection with a server

close() - Method in class chat_room.Connection
Closes this connection
close() - Method in class chat_room.server.Server
Closes the server
closingHelper() - Method in class chat_room.client.Client

Connection - Class in chat_room
Constitutes a connection (usually between a client and the server.

ConnectionException - Exception in chat_room.client
An exception representing an error with the connection of a client with a server
